channel.title: Civic on Aggregated Thinking

item.title: Civic Stories - December 2012
item.description: I sort of miss being in the backseat. A lot of my goofing off years have been conducted within the confines of the passenger doors, backside of the front seats, and the backseat. [gallery columns=“4” type=“rectangular” ids=“3012,3011,3010,3009,3008,3007,3006,3005,3004,3003”]
